sentence: This transmittal reports the correction of the previous       designation of the International Field Artillery Tactical       Data System (IFATDS) from non-MDE to MDE.

sentence: On August 26, 2020, Congress was notified by Congressional       certification transmittal number 20-0J of Australia's request       for the inclusion of the following non-MDE items and       services: spares and repair/return parts: consumables and       support equipment; publications and technical documentation;       maintenance, training and training equipment; U.S.
title: Arms Sales Notification
